rules_text:
[i]Infimary Master[/i] – Whenever a land you control enters, you gain 2 life and draw a card.
[i]Song of Silence [/i]– Opponents can't cast spells or activate abilities during your turn.
[i]Hexblade [/i]– Whenever Manuela, Divine Songstress attacks, up to two target creatures lose all abilities until end of turn.
